DOC.brief_summary: The study design compose 2 part , 2-way crossover multiple-dose . There 2 group part divide period 1 period 2 , wash-out period 16 day period . Each group take Telmisartan ( 80mg ) and/or Atorvastatin ( 80mg ) day 6 day .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Drug-drug Interaction Between Telmisartan Atorvastatin Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 19 55 year Subjects n't congenital chronic disease abnormal medical examination result within 3 year Healthy Subjects ( clinically relevant finding investigation preexamination ) judge investigator Subjects sign date informed consent form indicate subject decide participate study inform pertinent aspect study Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) Any condition possibly affect drug absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion ( e.g . gastrectomy ) Twofold upper limit normal range laboratory test ALT AST Participating clinical trial study within 2 month precede first dose investigational product History significant alcohol abuse drug abuse within one year prior screen Whole blood donation within 2 month prior dose , apheresis donation within 1 month prior dose Other severe acute chronic medical psychiatric condition laboratory abnormality may increase risk associate study participation investigational product administration may interfere interpretation study result , judgment investigator , would make subject inappropriate entry study Unwilling unable comply lifestyle guideline describe protocol Subjects inadequate study participate judge investigator
